Carrinho

    Preço: {{ itemCarrinho.preco | currency: "BRL"}}

Total: R$ 1300

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CarrinhoService } from '../carrinho.service'; import { IProdutoCarrinho } from '../produtos'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carrinho', templateUrl: './carrinho.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carrinho.component.css'] }) export class CarrinhoComponent implements OnInit { itensCarrinho: IProdutoCarrinho[] = []; constructor( public carrinhoService: CarrinhoService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.itensCarrinho = this.carrinhoService.obtemCarrinho(); } }
